fields.description:
h4. Feature Description
Customer wants to be able to use any view in as the custom pin instead of having to convert the view into a blob. 

h4. Extra info 
Customer have the feeling that this will do the entire process more efficient (memory and time wise) and easy (to code).
fields.summary: Android: Maps V2 module: Adding custom views in the pin

comments.body: This is the kind of custom pins that the customer wants to add.
Can be fixed on Android Maps v2
Test case #1 above added to map_module, test case #2 to mapv2 module test apps.

Hi,

apparently the customView property is not yet supported on Android. https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/58198c641d77e17d156431666e80bae732b5c130/apidoc/Titanium/Map/Annotation.yml#L87

Am I wrong? Is there an alternative?

Thanks in advance for your answer.
